languages.text: "Гнев и страх пожирают меня изнутри, и я не знаю, чего боюсь больше — мрачных ответов, скрывающихся за стенами шпиля, или шрамов, что останутся на сердце после. Но я обязана узнать правду о своем мире. Быть может... сегодня заблудший изгой вновь обретет свой путь".

traits.locale_text: "Гнев и страх пожирают меня изнутри, и я не знаю, чего боюсь больше — мрачных ответов, скрывающихся за стенами шпиля, или шрамов, что останутся на сердце после. Но я обязана узнать правду о своем мире. Быть может... сегодня заблудший изгой вновь обретет свой путь".

languages.text: "Fury and fear are devouring me from the inside out, and I do not know what frightens me more — the grim answers that hide behind the spire's walls or the scars that my heart will bear once I discover them. Yet, I must learn the truth about my world. Perhaps... this is the day the Outcast finds her Path again."
languages.original_text: "Гнев и страх пожирают меня изнутри, и я не знаю, чего боюсь больше — мрачных ответов, скрывающихся за стенами шпиля, или шрамов, что останутся на сердце после. Но я обязана узнать правду о своем мире. Быть может... сегодня заблудший изгой вновь обретет свой путь".

Yet I must learn the truth about my world. Perhaps... this is the day the Outcast finds her way again."

Yet I must learn the truth about my world. Perhaps... this is the day the Outcast finds her way again."

Yet, I must learn the truth about my world. Perhaps... this is the day the Outcast finds her way again."

Yet, I must learn the truth about my world. Perhaps... this is the day the Outcast finds her way again."

Yet, I must learn the truth about my world. Perhaps... this is the day the Outcast finds her Path again."

"Fury and fear are devouring me from the inside out, and I do not know what frightens me more — the grim answers that hide behind the spire's walls or the scars that my heart will bear once I discover them. Yet, I must learn the truth about my world. Perhaps... this is the day the Outcast finds her Path again."

languages.text: « La rage et la peur me rongent de l'intérieur et je ne sais pas ce qui m'effraie le plus, les réponses sinistres qui se cachent derrière les murs de la tour ou les cicatrices qui ne manqueront pas de marquer mon cœur lorsque je les découvrirai. Mais je dois apprendre la vérité sur mon monde. Le jour où l'Errante renoue avec sa Voie est peut-être arrivé. »
languages.original_text: "Fury and fear are devouring me from the inside out, and I do not know what frightens me more — the grim answers that hide behind the spire's walls or the scars that my heart will bear once I discover them. Yet, I must learn the truth about my world. Perhaps... this is the day the Outcast finds her Path again."

traits.locale_text: « La rage et la peur me rongent de l'intérieur et je ne sais pas ce qui m'effraie le plus, les réponses sinistres qui se cachent derrière les murs de la tour ou les cicatrices qui ne manqueront pas de marquer mon cœur lorsque je les découvrirai. Mais je dois apprendre la vérité sur mon monde. Le jour où l'Errante retrouve son chemin est peut-être arrivé. »

languages.text: “愤怒与恐惧正从内到外吞噬着我。我不知道哪个更让我害怕，是隐藏在尖塔高墙之后的残酷真相？还是真相会在我的灵魂上烙下的伤疤？但即便如此，我也必须了解我的故乡发生了什么事情。或许……流浪者是时候回到正确的道路上了。”
languages.original_text: "Fury and fear are devouring me from the inside out, and I do not know what frightens me more — the grim answers that hide behind the spire's walls or the scars that my heart will bear once I discover them. Yet, I must learn the truth about my world. Perhaps... this is the day the Outcast finds her Path again."

traits.locale_text: “愤怒与恐惧正从内到外吞噬着我。我不知道哪个更让我害怕，是隐藏在尖塔高墙之后的残酷真相？还是真相会在我的灵魂上烙下的伤疤？但即便如此，我也必须了解我的故乡发生了什么事情。或许……流浪者是时候回到正确的道路上了。”

languages.text: 「怒りと恐怖が、私を内から蝕んでいる。これ以上に恐ろしいものがあるとすれば何なのだろう。尖塔の壁の奥に隠された残酷な答えか、あるいはそれを見つけたときに私の心が負うことになる傷か。だがいずれにせよ、私はこの世界の真実を知らなければならない。おそらく…今日こそが、追放者が再び自分の道を見つける日なのだろう」
languages.original_text: "Fury and fear are devouring me from the inside out, and I do not know what frightens me more — the grim answers that hide behind the spire's walls or the scars that my heart will bear once I discover them. Yet, I must learn the truth about my world. Perhaps... this is the day the Outcast finds her Path again."

traits.locale_text: 「怒りと恐怖が、私を内から蝕んでいる。これ以上に恐ろしいものがあるとすれば何なのだろう。尖塔の壁の奥に隠された残酷な答えか、あるいはそれを見つけたときに私の心が負うことになる傷か。だがいずれにせよ、私はこの世界の真実を知らなければならない。おそらく…今日こそが、追放者が再び自分の道を見つける日なのだろう」

languages.text: "Wut und Furcht verschlingen mich von innen, und ich weiß nicht, was mir mehr Angst macht – die grauenvollen Antworten, die hinter den Mauern des Turms liegen, oder die Narben meines Herzen, wenn ich erfahre, was passiert ist. Aber trotzdem, ich muss die Wahrheit über meine Welt herausfinden. Vielleicht ... ist der Tag gekommen, an dem die Ausgestoßene wieder auf ihren Pfad zurückfindet."
languages.original_text: "Fury and fear are devouring me from the inside out, and I do not know what frightens me more — the grim answers that hide behind the spire's walls or the scars that my heart will bear once I discover them. Yet, I must learn the truth about my world. Perhaps... this is the day the Outcast finds her Path again."

traits.locale_text: "Wut und Furcht verschlingen mich von innen, und ich weiß nicht, was mir mehr Angst macht – die grauenvollen Antworten, die hinter den Mauern des Turms liegen, oder die Narben meines Herzen, wenn ich erfahre, was passiert ist. Aber trotzdem, ich muss die Wahrheit über meine Welt herausfinden. Vielleicht ... ist der Tag gekommen, an dem die Ausgestoßene wieder auf ihren Weg zurückfindet."

languages.text: «La furia y el miedo me devoran desde dentro, y no sé qué me asusta más: las aciagas respuestas que me aguardan tras los muros de esa torre o las cicatrices que dejarán en mi corazón cuando las halle. Pero debo saber la verdad sobre mi mundo. Tal vez... hoy sea el día en que la proscrita vuelve a encontrar su senda».
languages.original_text: "Fury and fear are devouring me from the inside out, and I do not know what frightens me more — the grim answers that hide behind the spire's walls or the scars that my heart will bear once I discover them. Yet, I must learn the truth about my world. Perhaps... this is the day the Outcast finds her Path again."

traits.locale_text: «La furia y el miedo me devoran desde dentro, y no sé qué me asusta más: las aciagas respuestas que me aguardan tras los muros de esa torre, o las cicatrices que dejarán en mi corazón cuando las halle. Pero debo saber la verdad sobre mi mundo. Tal vez... hoy sea el día en que la proscrita vuelve a encontrar su camino».

languages.text: "Öfke ve korku beni içten içe tüketiyor. Bu kulenin duvarları arkasında gizlenen kasvetli yanıtların mı yoksa onları keşfettiğimde kalbimin taşımak zorunda kalacağı yara izlerinin beni daha çok dehşete düşürdüğünü bilmiyorum. Her şeye rağmen dünyam hakkındaki gerçeği öğrenmeliyim. Belki de bugün, Yurtsuz'un yeniden Yolunu bulacağı gündür."
languages.original_text: "Fury and fear are devouring me from the inside out, and I do not know what frightens me more — the grim answers that hide behind the spire's walls or the scars that my heart will bear once I discover them. Yet, I must learn the truth about my world. Perhaps... this is the day the Outcast finds her Path again."

traits.locale_text: "Öfke ve korku beni içten içe tüketiyor ve beni hangisi daha çok dehşete düşürüyor bilmiyorum: Bu kulenin duvarları arkasında gizlenen kasvetli yanıtlar mı, yoksa onları keşfettiğimde kalbimin taşımak zorunda kalacağı yara izleri mi. Yine de dünyam hakkındaki gerçeği öğrenmeliyim. Belki de Yurtsuz'un yeniden Yolunu bulduğu gün bugündür."
